title: Deploy and Configure New Web Application Service
description: Create custom systemd service for web app, configure autostart, monitor logs

steps.instruction: Check if nginx is running and enabled for our reverse proxy
Create custom systemd service for Node.js application
Reload systemd daemon to recognize new service
Enable myapp service to start automatically at boot
steps.expected_outcome: Symlink created, myapp will start at boot

steps.instruction: Check service logs to verify successful startup
steps.expected_outcome: Logs show 'Server started on port 3000', no errors

success_criteria: Custom application service created, enabled, started, logs show healthy state
